item.title: Abyssos
item.description: Fights in tier: P5S - Proto-Carbuncle P6S - Hegemone P7S - Adgistis P8S - Hephaistos General Tier Info Mitigation sheet

item.title: P5S - Proto-Carbuncle
item.description: Encounter Info DPS Check 49.2k Enrage 9:58 Drops Chest One Chest Two 1 coffer randomly selected from the following 2 unique coffers randomly selected from the following - Wrist - Wrist - Ear - Ear - Neck - Neck - Ring - Ring Strategy Reference Devour Joonbob Devour Mini-Guide Luka Strat Devour Mini-Guide Guide Links Video Guide:

item.title: P6S - Hegemone
item.description: Encounter Info DPS Check 53.9k Enrage 10:39 Drops Chest One Chest Two 1 coffer randomly selected from the following 2 unique coffers randomly selected from the following - Head - Head - Hand - Hand - Foot - Foot Tome weapon trade-in Tome accesory upgrade Strategy Reference Guide Links The Balance:

item.title: P7S - Adgistis
item.description: Encounter Info DPS Check 58.6k Enrage 11:13 Drops Chest One Chest Two 1 coffer randomly selected from the following 1 Leg coffer - Head Tome armor upgrade - Hand Tome weapon upgrade - Foot Strategy Reference Position Setup Blades of Attis Forbidden Fruit 1 Bough of Attis For this, the red debuff indicates a point-blank AoE that needs to be spread, and the blue debuff indicates a stack marker.

item.title: P8S - Hephaistos
item.description: Encounter Info DPS Check Part I: 61.6k Part II: 65.3k Enrage Part I: 7:52 Part II: 8:26 Drops Chest One Chest Two 1 coffer randomly selected from the following 2 unique coffers randomly selected from the following Strategy Reference Part I Illusory Creation/Manifold Flames OR Two possible patterns for this, priority is based on your corner partners (so, if your corner is NW, you would go either north or west).
